edu.hm.shareit.business

Interface MediaService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MediaServiceImpl

    public interface MediaService
    Interface for creating, updating and retrieving Medias.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceStatus addBook(Book book)
      Validates the book and adds it to the repository.
      ServiceStatus addDisc(Disc disc)
      Validates the disc and adds it to the repository.
      ServiceResult getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
      Returns a book with an specific isbn.
      ServiceResult getBooks()
      Returns all the books in the repository.
      ServiceResult getDisc(java.lang.String barcode)
      Returns a disc with a specific barcode.
      ServiceResult getDiscs()
      Returns all the discs in the repository.
      ServiceStatus updateBook(Book book, java.lang.String isbn)
      Looks up the book in the repository and updates it.
      ServiceStatus updateDisc(Disc disc, java.lang.String barcode)
      Looks up the disc in the repository and updates it.

    • Method Detail

        ServiceStatus addBook(Book book)
        Validates the book and adds it to the repository.
        Parameters:
        book - the book to be validated
        Returns:
        the result of the operation

      • addDisc

        ServiceStatus addDisc(Disc disc)
        Validates the disc and adds it to the repository.
        Parameters:
        disc - the disc to be validated
        Returns:
        the result of the operation

      • getBooks

        ServiceResult getBooks()
        Returns all the books in the repository.
        Returns:
        Array of all books.

      • getDiscs

        ServiceResult getDiscs()
        Returns all the discs in the repository.
        Returns:
        Array of all discs.

      • getBook

        ServiceResult getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
        Returns a book with an specific isbn.
        Parameters:
        isbn - the isbn of the book.
        Returns:
        the book or null if not available.

      • getDisc

        ServiceResult getDisc(java.lang.String barcode)
        Returns a disc with a specific barcode.
        Parameters:
        barcode - the barcode of the disc.
        Returns:
        the disc or null if not available.

      • updateBook

        ServiceStatus updateBook(Book book,
                         java.lang.String isbn)
        Looks up the book in the repository and updates it.
        Parameters:
        book - the book with updated values.
        isbn - the isbn of an existing book in the repo.
        Returns:
        the result of the operation.

      • updateDisc

        ServiceStatus updateDisc(Disc disc,
                         java.lang.String barcode)
        Looks up the disc in the repository and updates it.
        Parameters:
        disc - the disc with updated values.
        barcode - the barcode of an existing disc in the repo.
        Returns:
        the result of the operation.
